title: Sampler, 1794
medium:
Medium: linen and silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: darning and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Fifteen samples of darning arranged around central square with initials "L A M B" "ANNO" and the date "1794".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1794.
1794. Medium: linen and silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: darning and satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-77.
